name: Online Games
author: Critic Games

sections.description:
Display free online games in your website easily & in less than a minute.

  • You can display each game individually anywhere in your WordPress Site using simple short codes.

83 Quality Games are Available Under 8 Categories

Note: We just begin adding new quality games every month so stay tuned for more!

Action Games

  • Angry Birds Space

  • Batman Defend Gotham

  • Call of Duty Crossfire

  • Car Twisted Dreams

  • Dragonball 1

  • Happy Wheels

  • Hulk Smash Up

  • Iron Man 2

  • Ninja Battle 3

  • Pokemon Tower Defense

  • Power Rangers Dino Thunder

  • Superman Metropolis Defender

Adventure Games

Arcade Games

  • Super Mario Bros

  • Super Mario World

Bubble Shooter Games

Skill Games

sections.installation:
1. Upload the games folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin by going to the Critic Games menu that appears in your admin menu

short_description: Display up to 83 free HD Flash Games in your website easily using shortcodes. Arcade games like Mario, Solitaire, Backgammon, Chess & more.
